text: �On him I rely... He [Sahl] was asked, �What is the reality of complete trust [in God] (tawakkul)? He replied, �It is to be at ease (istirsāl) with whatever God, Exalted is He, wants.� Then he was asked, �What are the requisites of complete trust?� He said, �The first is knowledge and its reality is acting [on it].� Then he said:Truly the person who has complete trust [in God] (mutawakkil), when he attains it in reality (ʿalā�l-ḥaqīqa), does not eat any food in the knowledge that there is someone who has more of a right to it than himself.
